description:
Grippy and ultralight, these mohair-nylon skins offer reliable backcountry performance with unrivalled weight. Small enough to pack in your pocket, the G3 Minimist Glide skins feature a carbon fibre insert at the tip to prevent snow creep, while a low profile tail connector keeps it fast and easy to adjust or remove.

  • Blend of 70% mohair and 30% nylon for maximum grip and durability
  • RipStrip makes pulling apart skins easier, and can be removed for added traction in case of adhesion contamination
  • 16cm length adjustment fits a wide range of ski sizes
  • Hydrophobic water treatment prevents snow or ice clumping
  • Non-toxic adhesive is functional to -30C
  • Trim tool and skin savers included
name: G3 Minimist Glide Skins
